name: intersection-observer
description: Implementation status:   - Chromium: [Shipped in Chrome 51](https://www.chromestatus.com/feature/5695342691483648)   - Edge: [Shipped in build 14986](https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/platform/status/intersectionobserver/)   - Firefox: [Shipped in Firefox 55](https://platform-status.mozilla.org/#intersection-observer)   - WebKit: [Under development](https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=159475)
